mapper.select: SELECT complex.marathon_id as mrtonId, complex.parent_proc_id as parentProcId, config.proc_name as procName, GROUP_CONCAT(sysuser.user_name) AS principals FROM ( SELECT mtoninfo.marathon_id, mtoninfo.parent_proc_id FROM mrton_proc_info mtoninfo WHERE mtoninfo.marathon_id = #{marathonId} GROUP BY mtoninfo.marathon_id, mtoninfo.parent_proc_id ) complex LEFT JOIN mrton_proc_cfg config ON complex.parent_proc_id = config.proc_id LEFT JOIN mrton_proc_user mtonuser ON complex.marathon_id = mtonuser.mrton_id AND complex.parent_proc_id = mtonuser.parent_proc_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sysuser ON mtonuser.user_id = sysuser.user_id GROUP BY complex.marathon_id, complex.parent_proc_id

SELECT procinfo.id AS mrtonProcId, ( CASE WHEN customize = 1 THEN procinfo.proc_name ELSE cfg1.proc_name END ) AS procName, cfg1.proc_name AS procName, cfg1.proc_seq AS procSeq, procinfo.customize as customize, date_format(procinfo.plan_starttime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS planStarttime, date_format(procinfo.plan_endtime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS planEndtime, procinfo.`status` AS STATUS FROM mrton_proc_info procinfo INNER JOIN mrton_proc_user procuser ON procuser.mrton_id = procinfo.marathon_id AND procinfo.parent_proc_id = procuser.parent_proc_id AND procuser.user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN mrton_proc_cfg cfg ON cfg.proc_id = procinfo.parent_proc_id LEFT JOIN mrton_proc_cfg cfg1 ON cfg1.proc_id = procinfo.proc_id WHERE procinfo.marathon_id = #{marathonId} AND cfg.proc_name = #{procName} ORDER BY cfg1.proc_seq

SELECT DISTINCT mrton.marathon_uuid, marathon_name FROM mrton_proc_cfg cfg INNER JOIN mrton_proc_user procuser ON procuser.parent_proc_id = cfg.proc_id AND procuser.user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN marathon_info mrton ON procuser.mrton_id = mrton.marathon_uuid WHERE cfg.proc_name = #{procName}

SELECT mrton.marathon_uuid as marathonId, mrton.marathon_name as mrtonName , cfg.proc_name as procName, CONCAT(mrton.marathon_name,cfg.proc_name) as mrthonMenuName FROM mrton_proc_cfg cfg INNER JOIN mrton_proc_user mpuser ON cfg.proc_id = mpuser.parent_proc_id AND user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN marathon_info mrton ON mpuser.mrton_id = mrton.marathon_uuid WHERE cfg.parent_proc_id = "0"

SELECT id, config.proc_id as procCfgId, ( CASE WHEN customize = 1 THEN procinfo.proc_name ELSE config.proc_name END ) AS procName, customize, plan_starttime AS planStarttime, plan_endtime AS planEndtime, ( CASE WHEN customize = 1 THEN procinfo.reserve2 ELSE config.proc_content END ) AS procContent, ( CASE WHEN customize = 1 THEN procinfo.reserve3 ELSE config.proc_descri END ) AS procDescri FROM `mrton_proc_info` procinfo LEFT JOIN mrton_proc_cfg config ON procinfo.proc_id = config.proc_id where id = #{mrtonprocId}
